outline.title: COGNIFLOW Repository Update Summary
outline.summary: Title slide introducing the repository updates.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/COGNIFLOW/slide6_roadmap.png - This image visually represents the concept of enhancing intelligence and a journey of development, aligning with the slide's title and content about Nexus v.3.

outline.title: Modernizing Brand and Intelligence
outline.summary: Overview of the key changes made to the repository.

outline.title: New Visual Identity Implementation
outline.summary: Details on the logo and favicon updates.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/COGNIFLOW/slide3_visual_identity.png - This image clearly shows a brand identity with a logo, directly relating to the 'New Visual Identity Implementation' and 'Aligning with High-Fidelity Aesthetics' discussed in the slide.

outline.title: AI Chat Interface Upgrade
outline.summary: Information on the integration of assistant-ui.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/COGNIFLOW/slide4_ai_chat.png - This image displays an AI chat interface, which is the core topic of this slide, specifically mentioning the 'AI Chat Interface Upgrade' and 'Transitioning to Professional Frameworks'.

outline.title: Technical Implementation Details
outline.summary: Technical breakdown of the components and services updated.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/COGNIFLOW/slide5_technical_stack.png - This image illustrates a technical architecture with frontend, backend, AI models, and database, which aligns with the 'Technical Implementation Details' and 'Leveraging Modern React Ecosystem' discussed in the slide.

outline.title: Conclusion and Future Roadmap
outline.summary: Summary of results and future plans for the project.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_LMNgdz_image.png - This image shows the Cogniflow application interface, representing the 'Cohesive and Powerful Experience' and the overall update summary, making it suitable for the conclusion.
